title: Merge a Branch (Challenge)
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to merge a branch into the current branch using Git, which is a crucial skill for managing changes and collaborating on projects.

meta.title: Merge a Branch: A Git Collaboration Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to merge branches in Git, a powerful version control system, to streamline your collaborative development workflow.
meta.keywords: software development, version control, git labs, git, branch merging, collaboration, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful merge
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
